--all-warnings
--extra-warnings
-W
-Wabi
-Wabi-tag
-Wabi=
-Waggregate-return
-Waliasing
-Walign-commons
-Waligned-new=[none|global|all]
-Wall
-Walloc-size-larger-than=<bytes>
-Walloc-zero
-Walloca
-Walloca-larger-than=<number>
-Wampersand
-Wanalyzer-too-complex
-Warith-conversion
-Warray-bounds=<0,2>
-Warray-temporaries
-Wassign-intercept
-Wattribute-alias
-Wattribute-alias=<0,2>
-Wbad-function-cast
-Wc++-compat
-Wc++0x-compat
-Wc++11-compat
-Wc++14-compat
-Wc++17-compat
-Wc++1z-compat
-Wc++20-compat
-Wc++2a-compat
-Wc-binding-type
-Wcast-align
-Wcast-align=strict
-Wcast-qual
-Wcast-result
-Wcatch-value
-Wcatch-value=<0,3>
-Wcharacter-truncation
-Wchkp
-Wclass-conversion
-Wclass-memaccess
-Wcomma-subscript
-Wcomments
-Wcompare-reals
-Wconditionally-supported
-Wconversion
-Wconversion-extra
-Wconversion-null
-Wctor-dtor-privacy
-Wdate-time
